alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:06PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Richland and east central Crawford Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 705 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Richland Center, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Richland Center around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Eagle Cave, Horrigan Ridge, Ithaca, Highway 58 And County B, Tavera, Sextonville, Neptune, Gotham, Highway 171 And County U and County Roads A And Z. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
